buildCouchbaseConnection

public CouchbaseConnectionFactory buildCouchbaseConnection(java.util.List<java.net.URI> baseList,
                                                           java.lang.String bucketName,
                                                           java.lang.String usr,
                                                           java.lang.String pwd)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
Get the CouchbaseConnectionFactory set up with the provided parameters. Note that a CouchbaseConnectionFactory requires the failure mode is set to retry, and the locator type is discovered dynamically based on the cluster you are connecting to. As a result, these values will be overridden upon calling this function.

Parameters:
baseList - a list of URI's that will be used to connect to the cluster
bucketName - the name of the bucket to connect to
usr - the username for the bucket
pwd - the password for the bucket
Returns:
a CouchbaseConnectionFactory object
Throws:
java.io.IOException
